website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for a basic commercial tire that gives you good results across the board.
pros: Has wider shoulders than some commercial tires, which allows it to stand up to all kinds of road conditions
Tread design ensures an even wear across the entire tire, giving you a longer lasting product
Casing and sidewall are reinforced to handle irregular roads
cons: Might not stand up well to extremely heavy loads, causing noise and extra wear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire at an even better price.
customer_reviews.text: Tire was purchased to replace a weathered tire on RV. It was very easy to mount and balance, performed flawlessly on our trip in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Steer tires only, otherwise they work fine.
customer_reviews.text: These actually took less to balance than the American made tires that I ran last time. No wobbles or anything weird. A tiny bit of tread noise when I hit the brakes hard, but nothing to write home about. We'll see how they hold up. Update: I put two more on the back of the truck and would NOT recommend them for back tires. I'm getting a dangerous amount of oversteer without a load or trailer and will be taking those off again. They still seem to be fine as steer tires, just not drive tires.
customer_reviews.author: muirne

customer_reviews.title: Work great on our Motorhome
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the front of our 32' Fleetwood motorhome. We have been out on several trips since having them installed and they are performing great. I am going to be purchasing four more to replace the back tires this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value tire
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my 94 Holiday Rambler Endeavor LE. They are rather unique size but these are very good quality tires and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Quanee York George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are great tires for that price, will order again. Great delivery, very prompt
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Great tire, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tire , great price . 1189 miles so far with no problems. Using them as steer tires on an older p30 .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good tires for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a limited use flatbed, normally I like to spend locally but my local tire store wanted $125 more per tire for the same tire, couldn't justify that for a truck that the tires will rot off of before they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Good quality
customer_reviews.text: After two years and 6000 miles these Double Coin RT600 tires (8R 19.5) are performing great. They have been used in 110 degree heat through Nevada and Utah at 60-65 mph with no issues. Using on a Class-A coach weighing in at 16K loaded.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Recommend to any one with RV ride an drive like a new one going buy 4 more for back of it
customer_reviews.author: Mikeodoma

customer_reviews.title: Love the tires
customer_reviews.text: Love me ride height they stand a bit taller which steepens the gear ratio
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for steer tires, after about 100 miles when new. worked good on my RV, in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: joe diaz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When I went on line to rder these tires it said they were 225/70 19.5 .When they arrived they were 19.5 but taller then what I ordered. Didn't know until I arrived to have installed they were a taller tire. Didn't have any choice but to put on but won't be able to rotate. Don't know if I will order anymore tires again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far the go down the road good with no issues
customer_reviews.text: mounted on my 71 TRAVCO motorhome. other than local driving I have not put any miles on them to speak of yet. so far the go down the road good with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: jenny jones

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at good price.
customer_reviews.text: Its a tire at a great price. Balanced out great also, made for a better ride.
customer_reviews.author: rnewpastor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are new, and only driven a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: American Express

customer_reviews.title: 5000 miles and doing good.
customer_reviews.text: fit and preformed as advertised, no issues to this point. 5000 miles and doing good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and personaly staying away from chinese tires after a bad experience. Probably for light duty or RV are ...
customer_reviews.text: Im a OTR driver and personaly staying away from chinese tires after a bad experience . Probably for light duty or RV are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Double Coin RT600 Premium Low Profile Regional/All-Position Steer Commercial Radial Truck Tire - 8R19.5 12 ply
product_meta.description: The Double Coin RT600 is ideal for P&D and regional applications. Built with protective sidewall ribs to withstand curbing, cuts and abrasions, this all-position tire features a 5-rib design for precise handling, lateral stability and superior traction.
feature_bullets: This commercial truck tire is built with EPA SmartWay verified technology
Enhanced tread compounds & siping fight irregular wear and provide long life in regional, urban and all-position applications
Premium 5-rib design with wide shoulders enhances truck tire durability and even wear
Durable casing with sidewall protectors promotes multiple retreads

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
